title: Pause before connecting
content: Whenever I make a call from my favorites it connects immediately. If I happened to misdial, it's impossible to hang up before the call has gone through. This invariably results in the "did you just call me" call back a few seconds later...usually when I am on the call that I had intended. Is there a way that I can add a two second pause, or possibly a confirmation screen that requires a second tap, before the call connects to the other party?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
